connect20/convertware_adzones_personaliz.name: connect20/Convertware_Adzones_Personalization

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/convertware_adzones_personaliz.description: Convertware offers the ability to create custom zones in your Magento site for advertising messaging. As you'll see in the details to come, designs will be utilized to place a dynamic banner advertising messages that conform and adapt to the users coming to decide.
